          This exception indicates that an operation has been performed on an invalid application, e.g. an application could not be deployed because of a version incompatibility.

          This exception indicates that an invalid expression has been entered.
 class InvalidNewPasswordException
          This exception indicates that the entered new password is not excepted for any reason.

          This exception indicates that a given data table record has already been locked by another user.

          This exception indicates that a given data table record could not be retrieved from data source for any reason.
 class RequiredFieldException
          This exception indicates that a required table field has not been set when committing a data table record.

 class TerminatedSessionException
          This exception indicates that a user session has been terminated.
 class TimeoutApplicationException
          This exception indicates that a user session has been timed out, because no user interaction has been performed for a certain while.
 class UncommittedLinkedRecordException
          This exception indicates that a record is going to be saved (committed), which is linked to an uncommitted record.

 class UserNotExistingException
          This exception indicates that a user with a given id does not exist.
 class ValueOutOfRangeException
          This exception indicates that a given value is out of range.
 class ValueTooBigException

 class ValueTooSmallException
